html:
Roles, voice types, premier cast
Role Voice type[16] Premiere cast 6 September 1791[17]
Conductor: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart
Tito Vespasian, Roman Emperor tenor
Vitellia, daughter of the deposed Emperor Vitellio soprano
Sesto, a young patrician, friend of Tito, in love with Vitellia soprano castrato; in modern performance
mezzo-soprano or countertenor
Annio, a young patrician, friend of Sesto, in love with Servilia soprano (en travesti) is listed in the score,
but usually sung by mezzo-soprano
Servilia, sister of Sesto, in love with Annio soprano
Publio, Praetorian prefect, commander of the Praetorian Guard bass
